existing_features.title: Create a multi-page Indian restaurant website with the following pages and navigation: Home, Menu, About Us, Gallery, Online Reservation, Contact. Ensure navigation works on desktop and mobile (responsive).

Apply a modern, clean, cohesive visual theme appropriate for an Indian restaurant (warm, inviting palette; consistent typography; consistent spacing; accessible contrast). Do not use a blue/purple-dominant palette.

Home page: add sections for (1) hero headline and short description, (2) special dishes (highlighted items), (3) customer reviews/testimonials, (4) opening hours, and (5) location summary with address text.

Menu page: display menu items grouped by category (e.g., Starters, Main Course, Breads, Desserts, Beverages). Each item shows name, description, price, and optional vegetarian/non-vegetarian indicator.

About Us page: include restaurant story/description content, cuisine focus, and a short section highlighting quality/ingredients/hospitality. Ensure content is in English and matches an Indian restaurant context (no placeholder lorem ipsum).
Gallery page: display a grid of restaurant/food images with a click-to-view larger preview (modal/lightbox).

Online Reservation page: implement a reservation form that collects at minimum: full name, phone number, date, time, number of guests, and optional notes. Validate required fields client-side and submit to backend for storage.
Contact page: display restaurant details including phone number 8742895627 and address "-15, Rani bazar Jaipur". Also include opening hours and a simple location section (text-based).

Admin section (UI + backend): create a simple admin area that allows an authenticated admin to add, edit, and delete menu categories/items (including name, description, price, category, veg/non-veg flag, and optional image reference). Use Internet Identity authentication and restrict admin methods so only authorized principals can modify menu data.
Seed initial content: include a reasonable default set of Indian menu items (at least 12 items across categories) and at least 3 special dishes and 3 reviews so the site is not empty on first load.

Add generated static images as frontend assets and use them across the website (home hero, logo, and gallery images). Store them under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not route images through the backend).
